item.title: Protect Your API Endpoints
item.description: Protect Your API Endpoints Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Links to original docs: https://developer.okta.com/archive/php/protect-your-api Structure type: Task Content type: Integration guide An integration guide or coding guide illustrates how to perform a specific task that involves writing code. It is similar to a how-to but the focus is more technical and geared towards developers integrating an SDK, API, or another library into their applications.
